   19: %%
   20: -module(ssl_bench_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct_event.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %% Callback functions
   27: -export([suite/0,
   28:          all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          end_per_suite/1,
   32:          init_per_group/2,
   33:          end_per_group/2,
   34:          init_per_testcase/2,
   35:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   36: 
   37: -define(remote_host, "NETMARKS_REMOTE_HOST").
   38: 
   39: %% Test cases
   40: -export([setup_sequential/1,
   41:          setup_sequential_noreuse/1,
   42:          setup_sequential_13/1,
   43:          setup_concurrent/1,
   44:          setup_concurrent_noreuse/1,
   45:          setup_concurrent_13/1,
   46:          payload/1,
   47:          payload_13/1
   48:         ]).
   49: 
   50: %% spawn/apply export
   51: -export([server_init/6,
   52:          client_init/6,
   53:          setup_connection/3,
   54:          setup_server_init/5,
   55:          payload/3
   56:         ]).
   57: 
   58: %% Manual test
   59: -export([ssl/0,
   60:          test/2
   61:         ]).
   62: 
   63: 
   64: -define(COUNT, 400).
   65: -define(REDUCE, 40). % (?COUNT rem ?REDUCE) should be 0
   66: %% (?COUNT div ?REDUCE) is the count used for a non-benchmark run
   67: 
   68: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   69: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   70: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   71: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[{ts_install_cth,[{nodenames,2}]}]}].
   72: 
   73: all() ->
   74:     %% {repeat,_} here overrides {repeat,_} in groups()
   75:     [{group, setup, [{repeat,1}]},
   76:      {group, payload, [{repeat,1}]}].
   77: 
   78: groups() ->
   79:     [{benchmark, [{group, G} || {group, G, _} <- all()]},
   80:      %%
   81:      {setup, [{repeat,3}],
   82:       [setup_sequential, setup_sequential_noreuse, setup_sequential_13,
   83:        setup_concurrent, setup_concurrent_noreuse, setup_concurrent_13]},
   84:      {payload, [{repeat,3}],
   85:       [payload, payload_13]}
   86:     ].
   87: 
   88: %%-------
   89: 
   90: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   91:     ct:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
   92:     Skipped = make_ref(),
   93:     try
   94:         node() =/= nonode@nohost
   95:             orelse throw({Skipped, "Node not distributed"}),
   96:         %%
   97:         ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
   98:         [{server_node, ssl_bench_test_lib:setup(perf_server)}|Config]
   99:     catch
  100:         throw : {Skipped, Reason} ->
  101:             {skipped, Reason};
  102:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  103:             {failed, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  104:     end.
  105: 
  106: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  107:     ok.
  108: 
  109: %%-------
  110: 
  111: init_per_group(benchmark, Config) ->
  112:     [{effort,?REDUCE} | Config];
  113: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  114:     Config.
  115: 
  116: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
  117:     ok.
  118: 
  119: %%-------
  120: 
  121: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf)
  122:   when Func =:= setup_sequential_13;
  123:        Func =:= setup_concurrent_13;
  124:        Func =:= payload_13 ->
  125:     try
  126:         TLSVersion = 'tlsv1.3',
  127:         {supported, SSLVersions} =
  128:             lists:keyfind(supported, 1, ssl:versions()),
  129:         case lists:member(TLSVersion, SSLVersions) of
  130:             true ->
  131:                 Conf;
  132:             false ->
  133:                 {skipped, {not_supported,TLSVersion,SSLVersions}}
  134:         end
  135:     catch Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  136:             {failed, {Class,Reason,Stacktrace}}
  137:     end;
  138: init_per_testcase(_Func, Conf) ->
  139:     Conf.
  140: 
  141: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Conf) ->
  142:     ok.
  143: 
  144: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  145: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  146: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  147: 
  148: 
  149: %%-define(TC(Cmd), tc(fun() -> Cmd end, ?MODULE, ?LINE)).
  150: count(Config) ->
  151:     (proplists:get_value(effort, Config, 1) * ?COUNT) div ?REDUCE.
  152: 
  153: -define(FPROF_CLIENT, false).
  154: -define(FPROF_SERVER, false).
  155: -define(EPROF_CLIENT, false).
  156: -define(EPROF_SERVER, false).
  157: 
  158: %% Current numbers gives roughly a testcase per minute on todays hardware..
  159: 
  160: setup_sequential(Config) ->
  161:     Server = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
  162:     Server =/= undefined orelse error(no_server),
  163:     Cfg = [{version, 'tlsv1.2'}],
  164:     {ok, Result} =
  165:         do_test(ssl, {setup_connection,Cfg}, 20*count(Config), 1, Server),
  166:     ct_event:notify(#event{name = benchmark_data,
  167: 			   data=[{value, Result},
  168: 				 {suite, "ssl"}, {name, "Sequential setup"}]}),
  169:     ok.
  170: 
  171: setup_sequential_noreuse(Config) ->
  172:     Server = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
  173:     Server =/= undefined orelse error(no_server),
  174:     Cfg = [{version, 'tlsv1.2'}, no_reuse],
  175:     {ok, Result} =
  176:         do_test(ssl, {setup_connection,Cfg}, 20*count(Config), 1, Server),
  177:     ct_event:notify(#event{name = benchmark_data,
  178: 			   data=[{value, Result},
  179: 				 {suite, "ssl"}, {name, "Seq setup 1.2 no session"}]}),
  180:     ok.
  181: 
  182: setup_sequential_13(Config) ->
  183:     Server = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
  184:     Server =/= undefined orelse error(no_server),
  185:     Cfg = [{version, 'tlsv1.3'}],
  186:     {ok, Result} =
  187:         do_test(ssl, {setup_connection,Cfg}, 20*count(Config), 1, Server),
  188:     ct_event:notify(#event{name = benchmark_data,
  189: 			   data=[{value, Result},
  190: 				 {suite, "ssl"}, {name, "Seq setup 1.3"}]}),
  191:     ok.
  192: 
  193: setup_concurrent(Config) ->
  194:     Server = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
  195:     Server =/= undefined orelse error(no_server),
  196:     Cfg = [{version, 'tlsv1.2'}],
  197:     {ok, Result} =
  198:         do_test(ssl, {setup_connection,Cfg}, count(Config), 100, Server),
  199:     ct_event:notify(#event{name = benchmark_data,
  200: 			   data=[{value, Result},
  201: 				 {suite, "ssl"}, {name, "Concurrent setup"}]}),
  202:     ok.
  203: 
  204: setup_concurrent_noreuse(Config) ->
  205:     Server = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
  206:     Server =/= undefined orelse error(no_server),
  207:     Cfg = [{version, 'tlsv1.2'}, no_reuse],
  208:     {ok, Result} =
  209:         do_test(ssl, {setup_connection,Cfg}, count(Config), 100, Server),
  210:     ct_event:notify(#event{name = benchmark_data,
  211: 			   data=[{value, Result},
  212: 				 {suite, "ssl"}, {name, "Conc setup 1.2 no session"}]}),
  213:     ok.
  214: 
  215: setup_concurrent_13(Config) ->
  216:     Server = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
  217:     Server =/= undefined orelse error(no_server),
  218:     Cfg = [{version, 'tlsv1.3'}],
  219:     {ok, Result} =
  220:         do_test(ssl, {setup_connection,Cfg}, count(Config), 100, Server),
  221:     ct_event:notify(#event{name = benchmark_data,
  222: 			   data=[{value, Result},
  223: 				 {suite, "ssl"}, {name, "Conc setup 1.3"}]}),
  224:     ok.
  225: 
  226: payload(Config) ->
  227:     Server = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
  228:     Server =/= undefined orelse error(no_server),
  229:     Cfg = [{version, 'tlsv1.2'}],
  230:     {ok, Result} =
  231:         do_test(ssl, {payload, Cfg}, 300*count(Config), 10, Server),
  232:     ct_event:notify(#event{name = benchmark_data,
  233: 			   data=[{value, Result},
  234: 				 {suite, "ssl"}, {name, "Payload simple"}]}),
  235:     ok.
  236: 
  237: payload_13(Config) ->
  238:     Server = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
  239:     Server =/= undefined orelse error(no_server),
  240:     Cfg = [{version, 'tlsv1.3'}],
  241:     {ok, Result} =
  242:         do_test(ssl, {payload, Cfg}, 300*count(Config), 10, Server),
  243:     ct_event:notify(#event{name = benchmark_data,
  244: 			   data=[{value, Result},
  245: 				 {suite, "ssl"}, {name, "Payload 1.3"}]}),
  246:     ok.
  247: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  248: %% ------------------------------------------------
  249: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  250: 
  251: ssl() ->
  252:     test(ssl, ?COUNT).
  253: 
  254: test(Type, Count) ->
  255:     Server = ssl_bench_test_lib:setup(perf_server),
  256:     (do_test(Type, {setup_connection, [{version, 'tlsv1.2'}]}, Count * 20, 1, Server)),
  257:     (do_test(Type, {setup_connection, [{version, 'tlsv1.3'}]}, Count * 20, 1, Server)),
  258:     (do_test(Type, {setup_connection, [{version, 'tlsv1.2'}, no_reuse]}, Count * 20, 1, Server)),
  259:     (do_test(Type, {setup_connection, [{version, 'tlsv1.2'}]}, Count, 100, Server)),
  260:     (do_test(Type, {payload, [{version, 'tlsv1.2'}]}, Count*300, 10, Server)),
  261:     ok.
  262: 
  263: do_test(Type, {Func, _}=TC, Loop, ParallellConnections, Server) ->
  264:     _ = ssl:stop(),
  265:     {ok, _} = ensure_all_started(ssl, []),
  266:     Certs = cert_data(),
  267:     {ok, {SPid, Host, Port}} = rpc:call(Server, ?MODULE, setup_server_init,
  268: 					[Type, TC, Loop, ParallellConnections, Certs]),
  269:     link(SPid),
  270:     Me = self(),
  271:     Test = fun(Id) ->
  272: 		   CData = client_init(Me, Type, TC, Host, Port, Certs),
  273: 		   receive
  274: 		       go ->
  275: 			   ?FPROF_CLIENT andalso Id =:= 1 andalso
  276: 			       start_profile(fprof, [self(),new]),
  277: 			   ?EPROF_CLIENT andalso Id =:= 1 andalso
  278: 			       start_profile(eprof, [ssl_connection_sup, ssl_manager]),
  279: 			   ok = ?MODULE:Func(Loop, Type, CData),
  280: 			   ?FPROF_CLIENT andalso Id =:= 1 andalso
  281: 			       stop_profile(fprof, "test_connection_client_res.fprof"),
  282: 			   ?EPROF_CLIENT andalso Id =:= 1 andalso
  283: 			       stop_profile(eprof, "test_connection_client_res.eprof"),
  284: 			   Me ! self()
  285: 		   end
  286: 	   end,
  287:     Spawn = fun(Id) ->
  288: 		    Pid = spawn_link(fun() -> Test(Id) end),
  289: 		    receive {Pid, init} -> Pid end
  290: 	    end,
  291:     Pids = [Spawn(Id) || Id <- lists:seq(ParallellConnections, 1, -1)],
  292:     Run  = fun() ->
  293: 		   [Pid ! go || Pid <- Pids],
  294: 		   [receive Pid -> ok end || Pid <- Pids]
  295: 	   end,
  296:     {TimeInMicro, _} = timer:tc(Run),
  297:     TotalTests = ParallellConnections * Loop,
  298:     TestPerSecond = case TimeInMicro of
  299:                         0 ->
  300:                             undefined;
  301:                         _ ->
  302:                             1000000 * TotalTests div TimeInMicro
  303:                     end,
  304:     io:format("TC ~p ~p ~p ~p 1/s~n", [TC, Type, ParallellConnections, TestPerSecond]),
  305:     unlink(SPid),
  306:     SPid ! quit,
  307:     {ok, TestPerSecond}.
  308: 
  309: server_init(ssl, {setup_connection, Opts}, _, _, Server, Certs) ->
  310:     {ok, LSocket} = ssl:listen(0, ssl_opts(listen, Opts, Certs)),
  311:     {ok, {_Host, Port}} = ssl:sockname(LSocket),
  312:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
  313:     ?FPROF_SERVER andalso start_profile(fprof, [whereis(ssl_manager), new]),
  314:     %%?EPROF_SERVER andalso start_profile(eprof, [ssl_connection_sup, ssl_manager]),
  315:     ?EPROF_SERVER andalso start_profile(eprof, [ssl_manager]),
  316:     Server ! {self(), {init, Host, Port}},
  317:     Test = fun(TSocket) ->
  318: 		   {ok, Socket} = ssl:handshake(TSocket),
  319: 		   ssl:close(Socket)
  320: 	   end,
  321:     setup_server_connection(LSocket, Test);
  322: server_init(ssl, {payload, Opts}, Loop, _, Server, Certs) ->
  323:     {ok, LSocket} = ssl:listen(0, ssl_opts(listen, Opts, Certs)),
  324:     {ok, {_Host, Port}} = ssl:sockname(LSocket),
  325:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
  326:     Server ! {self(), {init, Host, Port}},
  327:     Test = fun(TSocket) ->
  328: 		   {ok, Socket} = ssl:handshake(TSocket),
  329: 		   Size = byte_size(msg()),
  330: 		   server_echo(Socket, Size, Loop),
  331: 		   ssl:close(Socket)
  332: 	   end,
  333:     setup_server_connection(LSocket, Test);
  334: 
  335: server_init(Type, Tc, _, _, Server, _) ->
  336:     io:format("No server init code for ~p ~p~n",[Type, Tc]),
  337:     Server ! {self(), no_init}.
  338: 
  339: client_init(Master, ssl, {setup_connection, Opts}, Host, Port, Certs) ->
  340:     Master ! {self(), init},
  341:     {Host, Port, ssl_opts(connect, Opts, Certs)};
  342: client_init(Master, ssl, {payload, Opts}, Host, Port, Certs) ->
  343:     {ok, Sock} = ssl:connect(Host, Port, ssl_opts(connect, Opts, Certs)),
  344:     Master ! {self(), init},
  345:     Size = byte_size(msg()),
  346:     {Sock, Size};
  347: client_init(_Me, Type, Tc, Host, Port, _) ->
  348:     io:format("No client init code for ~p ~p~n",[Type, Tc]),
  349:     {Host, Port}.
  350: 
  351: setup_server_connection(LSocket, Test) ->
  352:     receive quit ->
  353: 	    ?FPROF_SERVER andalso stop_profile(fprof, "test_server_res.fprof"),
  354: 	    ?EPROF_SERVER andalso stop_profile(eprof, "test_server_res.eprof"),
  355: 	    ok
  356:     after 0 ->
  357: 	    case ssl:transport_accept(LSocket, 2000) of
  358: 		{ok, TSocket} -> spawn_link(fun() -> Test(TSocket) end);
  359: 		{error, timeout} -> ok
  360: 	    end,
  361: 	    setup_server_connection(LSocket, Test)
  362:     end.
  363: 
  364: server_echo(Socket, Size, Loop) when Loop > 0 ->
  365:     {ok, Msg} = ssl:recv(Socket, Size),
  366:     ok = ssl:send(Socket, Msg),
  367:     server_echo(Socket, Size, Loop-1);
  368: server_echo(_, _, _) -> ok.
  369: 
  370: setup_connection(N, ssl, Env = {Host, Port, Opts}) when N > 0 ->
  371:     case ssl:connect(Host, Port, Opts) of
  372: 	{ok, Sock} ->
  373: 	    ssl:close(Sock),
  374: 	    setup_connection(N-1, ssl, Env);
  375: 	{error, Error} ->
  376: 	    io:format("Error: ~p (~p)~n",[Error, length(erlang:ports())]),
  377: 	    setup_connection(N, ssl, Env)
  378:     end;
  379: setup_connection(_, _, _) ->
  380:     ok.
  381: 
  382: payload(Loop, ssl, D = {Socket, Size}) when Loop > 0 ->
  383:     ok = ssl:send(Socket, msg()),
  384:     {ok, _} = ssl:recv(Socket, Size),
  385:     payload(Loop-1, ssl, D);
  386: payload(_, _, {Socket, _}) ->
  387:     ssl:close(Socket).
  388: 
  389: msg() ->
  390:     <<"Hello", 
  391:       0:(512*8), 
  392:       "asdlkjsafsdfoierwlejsdlkfjsdf", 
  393:       1:(512*8),
  394:       "asdlkjsafsdfoierwlejsdlkfjsdf">>.
  395: 
  396: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  397: 
  398: ensure_all_started(App, Ack) ->
  399:     case application:start(App) of
  400: 	ok -> {ok, [App|Ack]};
  401: 	{error, {not_started, Dep}} ->
  402: 	    {ok, Ack1} = ensure_all_started(Dep, Ack),
  403: 	    ensure_all_started(App, Ack1);
  404: 	{error, {already_started, _}} ->
  405: 	    {ok, Ack}
  406:     end.
  407: 
  408: setup_server_init(Type, Tc, Loop, PC, Certs) ->
  409:     _ = ssl:stop(),
  410:     {ok, _} = ensure_all_started(ssl, []),
  411:     Me = self(),
  412:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() -> server_init(Type, Tc, Loop, PC, Me, Certs) end),
  413:     Res = receive
  414: 	      {Pid, {init, Host, Port}} -> {ok, {Pid, Host, Port}};
  415: 	      {Pid, Error} -> {error, Error}
  416: 	  end,
  417:     unlink(Pid),
  418:     Res.
  419: 
  420: -ifdef(TC).
  421: tc(Fun, Mod, Line) ->
  422:     case timer:tc(Fun) of
  423: 	{_,{'EXIT',Reason}} ->
  424: 	    io:format("Process EXITED ~p:~p \n", [Mod, Line]),
  425: 	    exit(Reason);
  426: 	{_T,R={error,_}} ->
  427: 	    io:format("Process Error ~p:~p \n", [Mod, Line]),
  428: 	    R;
  429: 	{T,R} ->
  430: 	    io:format("~p:~p: Time: ~p\n", [Mod, Line, T]),
  431: 	    R
  432:     end.
  433: -endif.
  434: 
  435: start_profile(eprof, Procs) ->
  436:     profiling = eprof:start_profiling(Procs),
  437:     io:format("(E)Profiling ...",[]);
  438: start_profile(fprof, Procs) ->
  439:     fprof:trace([start, {procs, Procs}]),
  440:     io:format("(F)Profiling ...",[]).
  441: 
  442: stop_profile(eprof, File) ->
  443:     profiling_stopped = eprof:stop_profiling(),
  444:     eprof:log(File),
  445:     io:format(".analysed => ~s ~n",[File]),
  446:     eprof:analyze(total),
  447:     eprof:stop();
  448: stop_profile(fprof, File) ->
  449:     fprof:trace(stop),
  450:     io:format("..collect..",[]),
  451:     fprof:profile(),
  452:     fprof:analyse([{dest, File},{totals, true}]),
  453:     io:format(".analysed => ~s ~n",[File]),
  454:     fprof:stop(),
  455:     ok.
  456: 
  457: ssl_opts(listen, Opts, Certs) ->
  458:     [{backlog, 500} | ssl_opts(server_config, Opts, Certs)];
  459: ssl_opts(connect, Opts, Certs) ->
  460:     [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_opts(client_config, Opts, Certs)];
  461: ssl_opts(Role, TCOpts, Certs) ->
  462:     CertData = maps:get(Role, Certs),
  463:     {Version, KeyEx} =
  464:         case proplists:get_value(version, TCOpts) of
  465:             'tlsv1.2' = V -> {V, ecdhe_ecdsa};
  466:             'tlsv1.3' = V -> {V, any}
  467:         end,
  468:     Opts0 = [{active, false},
  469:              {depth, 2},
  470:              {reuseaddr, true},
  471:              {mode,binary},
  472:              {nodelay, true},
  473:              {versions, [Version]},
  474:              {ciphers, [ #{key_exchange => KeyEx, cipher => aes_128_gcm,
  475:                            mac => aead, prf => sha256}
  476:                        ]}
  477:             | CertData ],
  478:     Opts1 = case Role of
  479:                 client_config -> [{server_name_indication, disable} | Opts0];
  480:                 server_config -> Opts0
  481:             end,
  482:     Opts = case proplists:get_value(no_reuse, TCOpts) of
  483:                true -> [{reuse_sessions, false}|Opts1];
  484:                _ -> Opts1
  485:            end,
  486:     Opts.
  487: 
  488: cert_data() ->
  489:     ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(ecdhe_ecdsa, []).
  490:
